_header: Little wot it any man / how derne love may stand
_description: The Way of Woman’s Love — five 8-line stanzas (ababccdd) including 2-line refrain, ‘Ever and o for my leof ich am in grete thoghte / I thenche on hire þat I ne seo nout ofte’

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Lutel wot hit anymonhou derne loue may stondebote hit were a
                    frewymmonþat muche of loue had fonde…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…ase sterres beþ in welkne ant graces sour ant sueteWhose
                    loueþ vntrewe his herte is selde seeteEuer & oo etc.
BLHar2253.Note:
First four lines of each stanza written two lines of verse per line of
                    MS.
